title: Adventure Comics v2 00-12 516-529 (2009-2011) (Complete) (Avalon
description:
English | CBR | 27 Issues

Adventure Comics v2 #0-12 and 516-529
Publisher:  DC Comics
Publication Date:  February 4, 2009 - August 3, 2011

Join Superboy, Krypto, the Legion of Super-Heroes and more in this series that spans from modern day Kansas to the far flung future and sees the heroes of the DC Universe face off against villains both new and old.

Starring: Superboy (#1-3, #6-7, #9-10), Superboy-Prime (#4-5), Legion of Super-Heroes (#8, #12-Current), Mon-El (#11).

Second Feature: Legion of Super-Heroes (#1-4, #9, #11), Superboy (#5), Car-Vex (#8-10), The Atom (#516-Current).

After the #0 issue, the next twelve issues of this series are dual-numbered, with numbers #1-12 more prominent on the standard covers and #504-515 more prominent on the variant covers.  This continues the numbering from Adventures Comics v1 (1938).

Thanks goes to Avalon for this release.
